# Package Detail

The flash.external package contains the ExternalInterface class which can be used to communicate with the Flash Player's container.

  

* * *

Classes

| Class| Description  
---|---|---  
| [ExtensionContext](ExtensionContext.html)|  The ExtensionContext class also provides a static method `getExtensionDirectory()` for accessing the directory in which the extension is installed on the device.  
| [ExtensionInfo](ExtensionInfo.html)|  The ExtensionInfo class provides details about a particular AIR Native Extension.  
| [ExternalInterface](ExternalInterface.html)|  The ExternalInterface class is an application programming interface that enables straightforward communication between ActionScript and the SWF container– for example, an HTML page with JavaScript or a desktop application that uses Flash Player to display a SWF file.  
| [HostObject](HostObject.html)|  The HostObject is the base class of all host objects.
